downloadTitle: Integrating additional cloud storage services in Office 2013
downloadDescription: Learn how a cloud storage provider can register its service in Microsoft Office 2013 so that it will automatically appear in the Open and Save As user interface in Office 2013 client applications.

downloadFile.name: Integrating additional cloud storage services in Office 2013.doc
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/b/4/3/b43b491e-f14b-4e2b-9ff6-3ccb7ae620e2/Integrating additional cloud storage services in Office 2013.doc

detailsSection: Learn how a cloud storage provider can register its service in Microsoft Office 2013 so that it will automatically appear in the Open and Save As user interface in Office 2013 client applications.
detailsSection_file_name: Integrating additional cloud storage services in Office 2013.doc
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
